comment: Hi awak! I didn't email them, but, I wrote down my email address for them to contact. Boleh cuba step by step on MySJ Helpdesk -Sampai dekat bahagian last sekali, klik Got It dan check sama ada automatic terus dapat tarikh atau tak.Kalau tak dapat -
amr:
# ::snt Hi awak! I didn't email them, but, I wrote down my email address for them to contact. Boleh cuba step by step on MySJ Helpdesk -Sampai dekat bahagian last sekali, klik Got It dan check sama ada automatic terus dapat tarikh atau tak.Kalau tak dapat -
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / say-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (h / hi)
            :ARG2 (a / awak))
      :snt2 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (e / email-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
                  :ARG2 (t / they))
            :ARG2 (w / write-01
                  :ARG0 ii2
                  :ARG1 (a2 / address
                        :mod e)
                  :poss ii2)
            :purpose (c2 / contact-01
                  :ARG0 t
                  :ARG1 a2))
      :snt3 (b / boleh
            :mod (c3 / cuba)
            :manner (s2 / step-by-step)
            :location (d / department
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "MySJ"
                        :op2 "Helpdesk")))
      :snt4 (a3 / and
            :op1 (e2 / event
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Sampai"
                        :op2 "dekat")
                  :location (c4 / country
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "Bahagia"))
                  :time (s3 / sekali
                        :mod (l / last)))
            :op2 (g / get-01
                  :ARG0 (p / person
                        :name (n4 / name
                              :op1 "Klik"))
                  :ARG1 (ii3 / it))
            :op3 (c5 / check-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 p
                  :ARG1 (p2 / person
                        :ARG0-of (h2 / have-rel-role-91
                              :ARG1 p
                              :ARG2 (m2 / mother)))
                  :manner (a4 / automatic)
                  :manner (p3 / person
                        :ARG0-of h2
                        :ARG1 p
                        :ARG2 (s4 / significant-other)))
            :manner c5
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 p
            :ARG1 (p4 / person
                  :ARG0-of h2
                  :ARG1 p
                  :ARG2 (b2 / brother)))
      :manner (p5 / person
            :ARG0-of (f / fuck-01
                  :ARG1 p4)
            :mod a4)
      :mod (a5 / atau
            :op1 (t2 / tak)))

            :op2 (r4 / reply-01

                  :ARG0 y3
                  :ARG1 (p3 / person
